div.p:
It is very kind of you, dear Mr Ramsay, to help on the Algology of N.S.W. through Mr Bennetts
K. H. Bennett. aid and through your own personal exertions. The mail brought this morning the specimens from Port Stephens,
NSW. and these shall also have careful attention. Th[e] green Cladophora I had not yet from N. S. Wales I will send you bye & bye specimens of your Algs back, fully named, but at present I am striving to finish the Census of the vascular plants,
B83.03.04. so that the volume may be out in 1882 yet.

Lederstedtia is separated as a genus recently from Ulva.
Letterstedtia ? See Agardh (1873-90), part 3, pp. 175-7 (1883).
